verbose_text: In addition, PERK regulated translational attenuation promotes the protective degradation of the TIM17A subunit of the TIM23 import complex to attenuate mitochondrial protein import in response to stress.
evidence: PERK-regulated translational attenuation promotes the protective degradation of the TIM17A subunit of the TIM23 import complex to attenuate mitochondrial protein import in response to stress
